docs.title: Typical Adventure
docs.text:
A Typical Minecraft Modpack

Welcome to the official guide for Typical Adventure.

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
1. Install CurseForge / Prism Launcher
  2. Import Typical Adventure
  3. Allocate 6–8 GB RAM
  4. Launch

docs.title: Recommended
docs.text:
• Use Java 17 (if your pack needs it)
  • Keep GPU drivers updated

docs.title: Fast fixes
docs.text:
• View distance: 8–12
  • Simulation distance: 6–8
  • Disable shaders (if any)
  • Close browsers / overlays

docs.title: If you stutter
docs.text:
• Don’t set RAM too high (8 GB is usually enough)
  • Reboot after big mod changes
